Hi there!

 ![Jamieson Rothwell](http://jamiesonrothwell.design/images/headshot.jpg)
Want to learn more about Jamieson?  %[Learn about Jamieson](postback:learn_about_jamieson) %[One random fact!](postback:random_fact)

Or maybe you want to %[connect on LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/jamieson-rothwell-1329524/) with Jamieson
ONE RANDOM FACT!: Jamieson didnt own a computer until he was 33. He learned how to program using borrowed time on friends machines and any free computer he could fine. Learning Photoshop after hours at work Jamieson was determined to become a designer.
CONNECT WITH JAMIESON:
Sweet! Jamieson loves getting intros from JamiesonBot. You can either tweet her or connect directly to chat with her.
If you've got feedback or an opportunity, don't be shy! %[Connect me](postback:connect_me_live) %[Learn more](postback:learn_more)
LEARN ABOUT JAMIESON: I can tell you a bunch of stuff about Jamieson. Let me know what’s interesting to you. %[Childhood](postback:childhood) %[Education](postback:education) %[Career](postback:career)
DONE: Ok, cool. There's other stuff to check out. %[Childhood](postback:childhood) %[Education](postback:education) %[Career](postback:career) %[I want to chat with Jamieson](postback:connect_me)
CHILDHOOD:
Jamieson grew up in Kitchener Canada. He spent his childhood summers playing on the beaches of Lake Huron in a town called Kincardine. ![Kincardine Beach](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kitchener,_Ontario) 
Btw if you ever want to chat about something else, just say 'done'. %[I want to learn about his education](postback:education)
I WANT MORE DETAILS ABOUT HIS FAMILY:
His parents we're married in 1966 and recently celebrated their 50th anniversary.
His sister lives in Toronto and works as a teacher and he has two nieces in Toronto and one in Calgary
EDUCATION:
Jamieson went to University of Waterloo where he received a degree in Geography, While he was a student he discovered the then new web and a lifelong journey began.
Later in life Jamieson went back to school and received a diploma in Visual Effects for Film and Television. Though the skills learned might not seem like an asset to UI design, they have been invaluable for finding dynamic new ideas for UX challenges. %[Career](postback:career)
WHY LONDON?:
Jamieson had a grandmother who was born in London, which meant he was able to gain a work visa. 
While in London, and working for a marketing agency in Notting Hill, Jamieson had a conversation with a person long forgotten that introduced him to the idea of working online. Soon after Jamieson became one of the early professional web designers in the UK. %[Channel Four](postback:channel_four) %[Sony Europe](postback:sony_europe) %[APL/Zentropy](postback:apl_zentropy)  %[Career](postback:career)
CHANNEL FOUR:
Jamieson was employed as the Channel 4 Web Manager in charge of online educational programming. 
Basically, he designed websites for home improvement programs, gardening and cooking programs and Sesame Street. 
In addition to this, Jamieson collaborated with the British Dyslexia Society in creating the first dyslexia friendly online presence, years before text readers were created. This created an interest in highly accessible online experiences that continue to this day. %[Career](postback:career)
SONY EUROPE: Jamieson worked for Sony Interactive Europe as a web designer. While there he was responsible for designing microsites and landing pages for Playstation Games, site support for the Playstation Two site and game reviews. %[Career](postback:career)
APL ZENTROPY: APL Digital was where Jamieson got to work with some really big brands, The first digital agency in the UK, APL Digital worked with brands like Nestle, Mini Cooper, Unilever, Maybelline and Hewlett Packard. Jamieson was there when APL became Zentropy and in highsight it all felt too short for such an amazing experience. %[Career](postback:career)
QUARRY: Jamieson worked for Quarry in Waterloo Ontario for a short time before moving to British Columbia. While he was there he worked for such clients as Cendant Investments, Phizer and Fed Ex.  %[Career](postback:career)
BODOG:
Jamieson worked as the Creative Producer for Online Marketing while at Quarry. Essentially, if there was a marketing campaign (Bodog had 200 marketers so there always was a marketing campaign.) then it was Jamieson's responsiblity to ensure that the online presence was on time and to the approval of the stakeholders. 
These projects ranged from online poker tournaments, to creating and online video channel (2 years before youtube). %[Career](postback:career)
ABB:
Working at ABB was one of Jamieson's favourite experiences. Initially brought on to help with the UI, Jamieson helped establish a strong UX vision for ABB's enterprise software where there had previously been none.
Jamieson got to work with teams based around the world and travel across North America testing users in various scenarios and environments to provide an optimal and accessible User Experience. 
Jamieson was successful in getting ABB to adopt accessibility standards that ensured that all their applications were usable for visually impaired people. %[Career](postback:career)
COLLIGO:
Jamieson joined Colligo to initially help create a UI for their new SharePoint resource management application. While there Jamieson was challenged to come up with a prototype for Colligo's Dashboard document management application: an idea that had not been realized in the two years of his conceptualization. 
Within 5 intense weeks of iterations, Jamieson successfully delivered a prototype that was beyond spectators expectations.
ACTENUM: Actenum, needed a UX/UI designer to help improve workflows and UI design to help them get their product to market.
NAVARIK:
Jamieson was brought on board Navarik to help implement a User Centred approach to product creation. While at Navarik, he was successful in updating their design workflow to include regular user testing and prototype based design to help achieve their clients needs with smarter iterations.
In addition he helped document their applications after a 8 year hiatus and help standardize front end standards.
CAREER: Feel free to check out any section of Jamieson's career %[Channel Four](postback:channel_four) %[Sony Europe](postback:sony_europe) %[APL/Zentropy](postback:apl_zentropy) %[Quarry](postback:quarry) %[Bodog](postback:bodog) %[ABB](postback:abb) %[Colligo](postback:colligo) %[Actenum](postback:actenum) %[Navarik](postback:navarik)
